programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona and the team are in Liverpool, where treasures include a medal given to one of the first men to land on D-Day, a dress by Ossie Clark and one of the first vials of penicillin. [S] [HD.

programme.title: Great Expectations

programme.title: Moment of Proof
programme.desc: A fingerprint from an old break-in solves a murder at the same factory months later. Elsewhere, a DNA spray means police can finally apprehend a prolific motorbike thief. [S] [HD.

programme.title: Animal Park
programme.desc: 1/15. Ben and Kate return to Longleat, where a lion needs surgery to amputate part of his tail. Kate gets a surprise with the Eland babies, and Ben has a brush with a gorilla. [S,AD] [HD.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martin visits a two-bed terrace in Erith that only has a short lease. He also visits a terrace in Derby, while Tommy Walsh is in London at a top-floor flat with a charming view. [S,AD] [HD.

programme.desc: 21/25. Ross Kemp presents the quiz show where a team of four take on the Bridge of Lies. One by one they must cross the bridge, stepping on the truths and avoiding the lies. [S] [HD.
